lead_paragraph: When Unai Emery abandoned Sevilla in June after three successful seasons, the Europa League champions were forced to undergo an unwelcome coaching shake-up and hired former Chile boss Jorge Sampaoli.

headline.print_headline: Sampaoli Pulling the Right Strings at Sevilla
headline.main: Sampaoli Pulling the Right Strings at Sevilla

snippet: When Unai Emery abandoned Sevilla in June after three successful seasons, the Europa League champions were forced to undergo an unwelcome coaching shake-up and hired former Chile boss Jorge Sampaoli....
